DOC.brief_summary: An investigation into the relative effectiveness of thermal-aided muscle stimulation vs. body temperature muscle stimulation for eliciting muscle contraction in the quadriceps
DOC.criteria: Subject does not meet any exclusion criteria Age < 18 years Subject is pregnant Subject has an implanted pacemaker/defibrillator Subject diagnosed with epilepsy Subject has implanted metallic femoral rods Subject is chair or bedbound Subject has neuromuscular disease or abnormalities Subject BMI > 45 Evidence of disease or condition that, in the opinion of the investigator, may compromise the conduct of or results of the study
